sqlMap.select: select * from trainervo where trainer_id = #trainer_id# and trainer_pass = #trainer_pass#
select trainer_name from trainervo where trainervo.trainer_id = (select trainer_id from matchvo where mem_id=#mem_id#);
sqlMap.update: update trainerVO set trainer_name = #trainer_name#, trainer_gender = #trainer_gender#, trainer_Specialty = #trainer_Specialty# where trainer_id = #trainer_id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into trainerVO values ((SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('A', 6) STR FROM DUAL), (SELECT DBMS_RANDOM.STRING('A', 6)STR FROM DUAL), #trainer_name# , #trainer_gender#, #trainer_tel#, #trainer_bir#, #trainer_email#, #trainer_addr#, #trainer_career#, #trainer_age#, #trainer_Specialty#, (select nvl(max(trainer_no),0)+1 from trainerVO))
